import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ServiceFoodService } from 'src/app/service.food.service'; import { Tag } from 'src/app/shared/models/tag'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tags', templateUrl: './tags.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tags.component.scss'] }) export class TagsComponent { tags?:Tag[]; constructor(foodService: ServiceFoodService){ this.tags = foodService.getAllTags(); } }
